Red Sandals
kDesc
Trust these great-looking red sandals - as long as it's sunny outside. [#Legal]
Faites confiance à ces superbes sandales rouges (tant que le soleil brille). [#Legal]
Diese schicken roten Sandalen sind die perfekte Wahl, wenn draußen die Sonne scheint. [#Legal]
Scegli questi magnifici sandali rossi... finché fuori c'è il sole. [#Legal]
Confía en estas preciosas sandalias rojas, siempre y cuando haga sol. [#Legal]
ちょっとそこまで！スリッパは生活必需品。 [#Legal]
간편하고 멋진 레드 샌들은 어떠한 여름 옷이나 수영복과도 환상의 조합을 이룹니다.[#Legal]
Trust these great-looking red sandals - as long as it's sunny outside. [#Legal]
只要門外陽光明媚，就大膽穿上這雙漂亮的紅色涼鞋。[#Legal]
只要門外陽光明媚，就大膽穿上這雙漂亮的紅色涼鞋。[#Legal]
